body.description: Hulking Imperial combat droids with gleaming black armor and powerful jet boots, the Dark Troopers are a powerful design. The 6-inch-scale Black Series figure is detailed to look like the Dark Trooper character from Star Wars: The Mandalorian, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Star Wars The Black Series Kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars The Black Series includes figures, vehicles, and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy.

Star Wars The Black Series Kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars The Black Series includes figures, vehicles, and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy.

Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Star Wars The Black Series figures are presented in 6-inch scale with realistic detailing, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Star Wars to the next level. Highly poseable with multiple points of articulation, collectors can display these premium figures with pride in their action figure and vehicle collections.

Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Star Wars The Black Series figures are presented in 6-inch scale with realistic detailing, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Star Wars to the next level. Highly poseable with multiple points of articulation, collectors can display these premium figures with pride in their action figure and vehicle collections.

Build a Constellation of Collectibles With a massive catalogue of Rebels, Imperials, bounty hunters, and everyone in between, Star Wars The Black Series action figures make impressive additions to any Star Wars collection—spanning comics, movies, video games, and animated series. Collect them to build an interstellar world of your own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic War Droid, Not So Fantastic Price
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed with this figure. The sculpt is great, the paint for all the silver (there's a lot of silver) and the red eyes and chest lights are well done, and the figure's joints have more swivel points than I thought possible. The forearm swivels separately from the elbow, and the wrist joints swivel separately from the forearms. The knees swivel separately from the thighs and calves too. The wrist pegs are at the wrist joint itself, can swivel all the way up and down, and they feel a bit fragile. If you go really twisting around on the hands you could damage them. I popped the hands off and moved the pegs up and down to break them in. The chest overlay floats pretty freely and doesn't get in the way, but it almost floats a little too freely and likes to settle at awkward angles. The shoulder pauldrons are hinged to the chest overlay and they move separately from tbe overlay. I was surprised at how short the figure is. It is not really any taller than the standard stormtrooper, and it blends in pretty easily compared to the KX series droid (it stands a lot easier too).The figure comes with its blaster rifle, two fists, an open left hand and a trigger right hand, and two jet effects that plug into the heels of the feet. The jet effects are ball pegs instead of standard pegs. They plug in very easily and are compatible with Mandalorian jetpacks, even beskar Din Djarin's jetpack.I like the figure but I am no fan of the price point. I am not a big fan of army building droids anyways, and that price point really hurts. Two is enough for me, at least for now.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs a stand
reviews.reviewText: Cool dark droid; although, he really doesn't look that significantly different from any other dark trooper figure. Plus he needs a stand (not included) for any flying poses needed to save the damsel from the bigger bully bots!

reviews.reviewText: Everything I expected from the picture and my 8 year old loves it!

Muy buena figura,buen esculpido y buena articulación,hasta ahora no he tenido ningún problema con ella,el unico miedo que tengo es que se rompa la conexión de las manos intercambiables por lo delgada que es,pero si tienes cuidado no debería de tener ni un problema,en pocas palabras lo recomiendo
